lead_paragraph: Irish golfer Christy O'Connor Junior, who helped Europe retain the Ryder Cup at The Belfry with the shot of his life in 1989 and won four European Tour titles, has died in Spain at the age of 67.

headline.print_headline: Ryder Cup Hero Christy O'Connor Junior Dies Aged 67
headline.main: Ryder Cup Hero Christy O'Connor Junior Dies Aged 67
